description:
godoc: 
 must not occur inside 

Fixes issue 2532

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, dr.volker.dobler@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=290ad29728fa *** godoc: 
 must not occur inside 

Fixes issue 2532

R=golang-dev, dr.volker.dobler, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5450115

Committer: Russ Cox

http://codereview.appspot.com/5450115/diff/2001/lib/godoc/package.html File lib/godoc/package.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5450115/diff/2001/lib/godoc/package.html#newcode91 lib/godoc/package.html:91:

{{node_html .Decl $.FSet}}

On 2011/12/07 10:00:01, volker.dobler wrote: > I think the pre is needed as the declaration > contains markup. Dropping the p should do: > 
{{node_html .Decl $.FSet}}
Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5450115/diff/2001/lib/godoc/package.html File lib/godoc/package.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5450115/diff/2001/lib/godoc/package.html#newcode91 lib/godoc/package.html:91:

{{node_html .Decl $.FSet}}

I think the pre is needed as the declaration contains markup. Dropping the p should do: 
{{node_html .Decl $.FSet}}

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
